course.subject: SHSS
course.name: Global China Studies Internship
course.description: This course aims to provide students with internship educational opportunities locally and globally. Under the guidance of the course coordinator, students will undertake training and supervised internships with our potential collaborators (including government departments, NGOs, museums, media and press, cultural industries, social enterprises, social service organizations, business firms, and public corporations). Course assessment will be based on students' written reports and supervisors' evaluation. Cantonese may be used in off-campus trainings and internships, in some situations. May be repeated for credits. For GCS students only. Instructor's approval is required for enrolling in the course. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: chimz
reviews.comment_content:
其實我應該寫落SHSS1020B，但無得寫，咁就寫落呢個先，不過唔緊要，course content係一樣。

人院係中間人幫你send CV, statement of intent同transcript去不同機構，實際上你做嘅野、工作時間同人院無關，要自己同間firm講

今次winter intern全部都係NGO，競爭比往時大，大家都開始Get到winter sem 嘅意義。interview嘅時間正值大家考final個時，只要你肯去，基本上都請。
reviews.comment_workload:
人院要求:
1x initial report (intern開始後第2個禮拜交)
1x final report (intern完之後2個工作天內交)

其他就睇間firm俾咩你做。
